alert.note: Alert for Cabell; Calhoun; Jackson; Kanawha; Lincoln; Mason; Putnam; Roane; Wirt; Wood (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 7:33PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Meigs, southeastern Lawrence, southeastern Gallia, northwestern Calhoun, northwestern Kanawha, Putnam, northwestern Lincoln, Wirt, northwestern Roane, Jackson, southwestern Wood, Mason and Cabell Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 733 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mineralwells to 9 miles south of Gallipolis. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Huntington, Nitro, Ripley, Spencer, Winfield, Hamlin, Elizabeth, Proctorville, Hurricane, Barboursville, Ravenswood, Milton, Eleanor, Buffalo, Poca, Sandyville, Kenna, Teays Valley, Ona and Culloden. This includes the following highways... Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 120 and 166. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 13 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southeastern Ohio...and western, central, north central and northwestern West Virginia. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until midnight EDT for southeastern Ohio...and central and western West Virginia.

area.areaDesc: Cabell; Calhoun; Jackson; Kanawha; Lincoln; Mason; Putnam; Roane; Wirt; Wood
